name: Landing zone module
description: Create a module to provisioning landing zone on Azure Cloud, all resources provisioned with Terraform (IaC).

name: Network module
description: Create a module to provisioning a virtual network to support personal laboratory. This tutorial will create three networks, with specific rules to control traffic between components.

name: Kubernetes Cluster Module [AKS]
description: Create a module to provisioning a kubernetes cluster on Azure (AKS). This tutorial will allows to create kubernetes cluster ans install default tools by helm.
